title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content: ng, and more. In the recent Patch 8, the modding toolkit gets a new update to support partial level editing, enabling mod settings to create unique interactive objects and NPCs. This means that players can generate multiple objects that they can place anywhere on the map, override in-game template types in existing levels, and even add a script to an object by making it teleport away every time you get close to it (from the BG3 Patch Notes).
